Job Title: PLC Technician

Location: Kendallville, IN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Summary

PLC Automation Technician located near Kendallville, IN for a leading manufacturer for the automotive industry. This role is responsible to perform basic programming & troubleshooting of robotic equipment. To be considered - experience troubleshooting automation equipment within a manufacturing environment (Automotive experience is ideal). This is a direct hire opportunity to join a growing organization. APPLY NOW!

Required Qualifications

Must have at least three (3) years of Industrial maintenance experience Experience troubleshooting automation plant equipment within a manufacturing environment (Automotive experience is ideal) Experience with PLC troubleshooting

Preferred

Associates Degree within Automation, Robotics or related technical discipline

location: Kendallville, Indiana

job type: Permanent

salary: $68,000 - 72,000 per year

work hours: 3pm to 12am

education: High School

Responsibilities

Perform basic programming & troubleshooting of robotic equipment Conduct PLC troubleshooting, hardware troubleshooting, programming and analog inputs &outputs Conduct troubleshooting, repair & replacement of AC & DC motors & drives Assist Automation Engineers and other Departments during the development, installation and programming of Line upgrades and Line installations Understand and follow work instructions and control plans

The Essential Functions Of This Role Include

working weekends

Qualifications

Experience level: ExperiencedMinimum 3 years of experienceEducation: High School (required)
